events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this isn't what I paid for.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigning refund specialist Sarah J. to handle the case regarding incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and I’m here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process your refund request?
My order number is 987654321. I’ve attached a photo showing the wrong item delivered instead of the product I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. You can keep or dispose of the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund has been processed successfully and you should see the amount reflected in your bank account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and that everything is now satisfactory with your account.
We are closing this case now since the refund issue has been resolved. Please contact us again if you have further questions.
